thread.title: 18 Husbands Who Are So Ridiculous It's Actually Cute

author: Crystal Ro
title: 18 Husbands Who Are So Ridiculous It's Actually Cute
text:
View this image ‚Ä∫ 
maebaetautuaa / Via instagram.com Perfect night in, TBH.
ID: 10501760 2. This husband and his sassy response to a hint. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
jessamarlow16 / Via instagram.com ::eyeroll::
ID: 10501754 3. This husband whose wife was sick of his toothbrush touching hers, so naturally he did ~something~ about it. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
knlamansky / Via instagram.com ‚ÄúThanks?‚Äù
ID: 10500828 4. This husband who took the time to pick out all the yellow Sour Patch Kids because he knows they‚Äôre his wife‚Äôs fav. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
robin_renee299 / Via instagram.com ::whispers:: ‚ÄúFeel free to do this for me with the reds.‚Äù
ID: 10500877 5. This husband and his not-so-secret, secret hiding place. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
adamrf5 / Via instagram.com ‚ÄúOkay, FINE.‚Äù
ID: 10501670 6. This husband who was told to get a ‚Äúcute fall cake‚Äù at the store and came back with this. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
sarahbethnassif / Via instagram.com I mean, it IS cute.
ID: 10500902 7. This husband and his ~unique~ solution. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
mikelovesconnie / Via instagram.com Yuck, tho.
ID: 10500963 8. This husband who found another good (?) use for a nursing pillow. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
jenerek / Via instagram.com ID: 10501660 9. This husband who has a ~special~ way of making the bed. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
tinkabum / Via instagram.com ID: 10501665 10. This husband who got ~creative~ while air-drying his spouse‚Äôs delicates. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
lesleyshires / Via instagram.com Lamp-gerie?
ID: 10500890 11. And this husband who got creative while organizing the kid‚Äôs stuff. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
chreestagusta / Via instagram.com Funny, yet creepy.
ID: 10500937 12. The husband who literally FedEx-ed a sweet message just ‚Äòcause. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
icepickannie / Via instagram.com But was it priority overnight?!
ID: 10500900 13. This husband who takes notes from his spouse just a touch too literally. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
slimminglondon / Via instagram.com It‚Äôs okay (still works).
ID: 10500952 14. This husband who just wanted to incorporate his stuff into his spouse‚Äôs daily routine. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
calamity_castro / Via instagram.com ‚ÄúI am Groot.‚Äù
ID: 10500957 15. This husband who knows how to take a ~great~ selfie with his wife. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
sarah_sparkles33 / Via instagram.com ‚ÄúWhat I get when I ask my husband to take a cute picture of us masking together üôÑ .‚Äù
ID: 10501656 16. This husband who‚Äôs basically a super hero. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
aaliciaalexander / Via instagram.com ID: 10501777 17. This woman‚Äôs husband who found her long-lost favorite childhood stuffed animal after an eternity. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
emily.irl / Via instagram.com ‚ÄúThis is Clumsy. Unfortunately, I lost him somewhere around middle/high school. But thanks to the power of Google and EBay, Clumsy is back in my arms today! #husbandwin‚Äù
ID: 10500842 18. And finally, the husband who made this way-too-effing-cute breakfast. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
justyna.t / Via instagram.com S gh.
